2174.subject: MPA
2174.descrlong:
Students develop a live performance or presentation in the area of concentration, showing utilization of skills and competencies developed while at CSUMB. Must be taken for two semesters in sequence.  Recording students must complete MPA 408, contemporary students must complete MPA 401.  (Offered every semester.)

[Prereq:  MPA 300 and (MPA 408 for Recording Students or MPA 401 for Contemporary Students)]
